overview: In 1989, the Hammersmith and City line was still known as part of the Metropolitan line. This is a Driver's eye view from  Hammersmith to Whitechapel (where the H&C trains used to terminate) on board an unpainted aluminium C stock train and a District D stock service from there to Ealing Broadway. A lot has changed; witnessed by our recent re-shoot on board S stock trains.
tagline: Driver's Eye View: Hammersmith to Whitechapel, Whitechapel to Ealing Broadway
title: Metropolitan & District
